entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -18.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 08:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -18.1°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -21.8°C

Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning early this morning and ending this afternoon then 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Flurries beginning late this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
